title: Self-Directed Advanced Information Literacy Program: Strengthening Scientific Research Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Self-Directed Learning Modules Using Smartphone-Based VR Simulation Environments, Adapting Medical Education Case Studies to Scientific Research Contexts

learning_goals: Learners can identify highly reliable scientific information sources with 85% accuracy in VR simulation environments
Learners can enhance information literacy skills by over 20% at 4-week intervals using self-assessment checklists
Learners can produce integrated information reports with scores of 80+ (out of 100) in science research scenario-based simulations for three consecutive attempts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
